website_summaries.verdict: A good charging option for larger 48 volt golf cart batteries for fast and reliable recharges.
pros: Charger is compatible with any standard 120V AC wall outlet
Surface of the battery is clearly marked to see current charge status and battery state
Offers Periodical Restart to provide charge to batteries in storage
cons: Does not have an automatic shutoff to prevent overcharging

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is a JOKE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my charger in the fall of 2018. in August 2019, the amp gauge needle started to stick not allowing unit to shut off. So I contacted customer service and they advised that if I'd put the new gauge in myself they'd send one right out. Being pretty handy I said OK. Well after another 6 or 8 emails I have yet to see the repair part and I can't get anyone to return an e-mail. Oh, the gauge needle finally fell off and now at least the unit is automatically shutting off again. Needless to say, I won't be recommending these chargers or the company. So sad to see a company treat customers this way.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: This is only a top-off charger
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real battery charger; it is only a top-off charger. When I took it out of the box and put it on my EZgo cart nothing happened. So I call the factory tech support, and they told me that the batteries need to have at least half voltage for this charger to do anything. They said that all "intelligent" chargers are that way. Their literature did not say anything about this. When I put my meter on my batteries they read 10 volts on a 48 volt system. So they told me it would not work and so I boxed it back up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit, previously "returned" then shipped to me as new!
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived quickly, as i was unpacking it, the box looked like it had been delivered and "returned" already by the trace of the old shipping labels and the extra layers of tape around the box opening. I had purchased this "new", inside there was no manual again looking like a previously returned item. I got the charger out and assembled it, plugged it in and ......nothing. The unit would not power on, LED on the back indicating power. I feel very strongly this chargere had been sold at least once already because it did not work and then just re-shipped to me as "brand new". Not the type of service you would expect for this price point!
customer_reviews.author: William V. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The batteries on my golf cart had been completely drained and I was not sure they would charge back up. I purchased this charger and when I plugged it in, I was able to drive the cart within a few hours. I plugged it back in and now the golf cart is completely charged and ready to go. The main reason I purchased this one is because of what I call the "battery tender feature" and that is the charger turns itself off when the batteries are fully charges and then monitors the batteries to be sure they stay at 100%.
customer_reviews.author: TERMAX

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Our charger stopped working in less than a year. Sent it in for warranty work in which it was covered. They have had it for one month and I can not contact a live person to see if they can fix it or what the status of the work order is. I have left many phone messages and emails. I am so frustrated! Never have I had this happen that you can not contact anyone. Poor Poor Poor service. I would definitely not recommend this charger due to this. I would not of given this product even one star if I hadn't of been forced to for I may post this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: didn't last a full year!!!! Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This charger was great while it lasted. It is very heavy, but worked well so we kept it. It's less than a year old and can't be used anymore. The pins on the end of the cord that plugs into the charge are burnt. That makes this thing completely USELESS!!!! Called the manufacturer back in Aug and told them about the burnt end on the cord. I was told they would send us a new cord, but we would have to do the repair ourselves. No problem, we can do that, IF WE EVER ACTUALLY GET THE CORD!!!!! Save your money and get one that will last more than 7 months!
customer_reviews.author: SJD658

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger. Much more bulk than the original EZ-GO that we received with our cart, but comparing the two chargers almost doesn't make sense. This charger is a work horse, and gets the job done quickly! Very happy with this purchase! (Rubber feet do pop off easily, but we knew this ahead of time, and were able to be mindful of them)
customer_reviews.author: T. Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Rubber feet on bottom pop off easy but charges the batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Not a huge issue but the rubber feet on the bottom pop off easy. Supposed to screw in but that doesn’t evidently work. Not sure if they offer replacements. If anyone knows, please let me know. Knocking off one star since it must have them to vent properly and they are to flimsy. Outside of that, it charges the batteries as described. Purchased for 48 volt EasyGo.
customer_reviews.author: Gerb

customer_reviews.title: This is the best charger on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I have had problems with charging my cart battery since I bought it a year ago. No longer. From the first time that I charged my batteries with this charger the cart felt faster and showed a completely full charge. No we drive all around town for hours and don't worry anymore if the batteries are fully charged. The is a great charger and worth every penny that it cost! Actually its probably worth a lot more!!
customer_reviews.author: Gray Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A dud right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I got a lemon. We opened the box and plugged the unit in and Nothing! Completely dead, not even a light. There was no customer service number available. Thank God Amazon was able to assist.
customer_reviews.author: NH2FLA

customer_reviews.title: Company not returning phone calls.
customer_reviews.text: Charger failed after one year. Trying to reach company for three days, no response, will not return phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier than I am with this charger. Paying a little more money brought great value and it works amazingly well. I believe strongly it will help me get a year or two more out of my golf cart batteries which provide for a greater return on a large investment. Prior to purchasing the charger, I contacted the customer service Represenative to talk to him about why their charger is better than competitive chargers. He was very informative and took time to answer all my questions. This is a high-quality product and you know it the minute you take it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: WA/AZ Couple

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This product is so much better that original equipment. Very easy to use and am impressed with charging effect. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: John Shideler

customer_reviews.title: Hits the mark!
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy, it's well-made, it's made in America, and I can actually read the instructions! I wish I could buy more stuff that hit all of those marks. Excellent product so far; I will update this review if things change.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with and to plug it  the wall.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot figure out why they not send a and to plug it into the wall?! makes no sense spend $300 and then you have to go buy a cord to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in gold to save your expensive batteries
customer_reviews.text: This charger is worth the money. I used to have the original cheap charger that ezgo sells and it was constantly over charging my batteries. This charger is perfect. Just plug in and leave it. The charger will do the rest to keep the batteries precisely charged. Will be wonderful for the winter months too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To Early To Tell, But...
customer_reviews.text: Quick Delivery, Easy to use. At first the charger only had the power light on and would not charge the batteries to later find out that they were completely dead and needed to be charged individually. After charging them separately the accusense charger worked perfectly. i haven't had it for long so the longevity is in question.
customer_reviews.author: scott burgess

customer_reviews.title: Really good battery charger
customer_reviews.text: My EZ-GO charger died and replaced it with this one. So far has worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: charles roberts

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great!
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use this item as the batteries were shot. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Page B. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger. It's easy to use and informative as far as what state it is in via the lights on the panel. Charges the batteries fine, as long as you set them to the manufacturer type. Buy it, it's way better than the crappy OEM charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly! Won't turn on if the batteries are dead on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Gregory

customer_reviews.title: ... our 2008 EZGO RXV stopped working and apparently isn't good quality. Some online searching pointed me to this ...
customer_reviews.text: The factory charger for our 2008 EZGO RXV stopped working and apparently isn't good quality. Some online searching pointed me to this DPI charger and so far it seems to be doing the job quite well!
customer_reviews.author: DRGW SD40T-2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great on our EZGO Golf cart....And the service that we received from Car Partners was excellent...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C

customer_reviews.title: super smart charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger was bought for a ezgo 48 but can be convetered easily any 48 with a change of cable. You can plug in and leave it until you need the cart again. Fast charge at 17 amps but expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carver

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for the expensive EZGO charger.
customer_reviews.text: It runs hot. Does the job but would not like to leave it on between charges. Good alternative to EZGO charger that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph K. Bleier

customer_reviews.title: Great produce and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it now for about a month and a half and it is working as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kral

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Our charger died and we had to replace it. This one is much better quality and arrived quickly, which I needed as I had to get back out on the course with my cart. Good price, good shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: D. Sender

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement charger for EZGO cart
customer_reviews.text: I've just used this 4 times so far, but a much more solid charger than the flimsy EZGO charger that came with our new cart. The price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Dononlake

customer_reviews.title: Charges Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Charges quickly and is well built. Just what I was looking for. I would Highly recommend this charger to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Counselman

customer_reviews.title: Great. First charge took a long time because we ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. First charge took a long time because we had to top of the batteries and they were almost dead. Works just as described and we are always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cart charger
customer_reviews.text: Almost paid twice as much and more for a replacement at a local golf shop. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa3a

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger
customer_reviews.text: Replaced factory EZ GO charger when it no longer charged. This is a great charger made here in TN. Old one weighs about 3 pounds, new one about 33 pounds. Works great. I think it would be very difficult to find a better charger at any price. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: failed twice now
customer_reviews.text: Charger failed after a couple of months use. Tech support was good, got me replacement parts fast. They lasted 2 month. Failed in same mode again. Im done
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. Milford

customer_reviews.title: Love the charger
customer_reviews.text: It is doing what it is suppose to do. Did realize that my old charger wasn't charging my batteries completely, until I used this one .Love the charger. It's just heavier then I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Raven151

customer_reviews.title: Great charger and support
customer_reviews.text: Local shops wanted 550, I called and got great support. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Allan in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement charger for the golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement charger for the golf cart. I burned up two OEM chargers and have to wait months to get them repaired. This should be the last charger I buy.
customer_reviews.author: ExJet

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super Value, EZ go dealer wanted $400 for a factory rebuilt "silver" charger for my RVX. This one is much stouter, charges at 13 amps, plugs right in, no fuss no muss
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure that a cheaper version might now work well too, but this one works great
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, exactly as advertised. I would buy anouther if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: gary w.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This charger appears to be of much better quality than the original.
customer_reviews.author: mikecoots

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper then oem and from what I can tell just as good if not better
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: A-1 American made quality
customer_reviews.text: A real American made product.Super heavy duty and works perfect.Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was cheaper than getting local and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Up graded my golf cart to a 48 volt and needed a new charger, was cheaper than getting local and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael C

customer_reviews.title: Great charger. Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Very pleased. Very well made. Solid construction. It is heavy, but that's an indication of how well it's made.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Expected better for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The male and female ends where the charge cable connects to the charger are cheap plastic. The retaining nut already broke. Now being held on with wire ties.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Lee Brill

customer_reviews.title: Charged right up, took about six hours.
customer_reviews.text: Charged right up ,took about six hours .old charger would kick off not charge works real good
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We were worried when our EZ Go charger died and we had to pay so much more for another EZ Go charger. This one is priced great and absolutely works well on our EZ Go golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: Chutimar Altizer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommen
customer_reviews.text: Recommend this to anyone who are replacing an old charger for a new one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This unit is much heavier and better than the original unit for my Ezgo charger.
customer_reviews.text: This unit charged my batteries, the indicator lights was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product, far better than charger that came with golf cart
customer_reviews.author: Reese Norris

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUCH better charger that the one that came with our golf cart. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.....It failed after a few months and after a phone call and talking to main tech guy, a replacement circuit board was sent. I replaced it and the unit has worked perfectly. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: glen green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the one that came with our Ezgo cart
customer_reviews.author: Cryslee8

customer_reviews.title: This charger did great and charged our cart really well
customer_reviews.text: This charger did great and charged our cart really well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is looking to get a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Charmon

customer_reviews.title: Battery Ry charger.
customer_reviews.text: Well done. Got it with no waiting. Workss great. Thank you, Merle
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn O.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: good product at a good price. Completely satisfied with this battery charger.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: ... it has meet an exceed my expect ions very good product arrived on time an would use them
customer_reviews.text: So far it has meet an exceed my expect ions very good product arrived on time an would use them again
customer_reviews.author: Ron. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy for the price and works well. Shipping was real quick on time.
customer_reviews.author: thomas rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the OEM charger that was a different brand, ended up in the dump. This one is fast and I can leave it charged in to my golf cart even after the batteries have fully charged. Well designed and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Really good charger and really good vendor
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the original charger. It isn't a trickle charger, so it works differently than the OEM piece of junk which came with the cart. It chargers faster and more fully than the OEM QE Powerwise charger. The first one I ordered came damaged and the vendor replaced it and it even got delivered on the weekend. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit and worked great. Much heavier than the EZ GO charger. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Hale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my "Factory" charger which died. Ever since new I had problems with what I thought were related to batteries. Over time all four batteries were replaced under warranty. Still performance was marginal with battery meter showing ~1/4 charge remaining after 18 holes. This new charger does a much better job with battery meter now just below full after 18 holes. Also, while charging with the "Factory" charger you could smell the electrolyte aroma in the garage while charging. Not so with this charger. Not to mention that this charger is ~ 1/2 the cost of a "Factory" replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Miller

customer_reviews.title: The original charger made in China was a piece of crap. Buy American
customer_reviews.text: Charger is all that I expected. Getting a full charge for the first time in years. The original charger made in China was a piece of crap. Buy American.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Werner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great charge last a lot longer than with old charger.
customer_reviews.author: leonard lanham

customer_reviews.title: 100% better than the stock charger.
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. I don't think the stock charger was giving the batteries a full charge before it shut off automatically. This charger FULLY charged them allowing them to go at least 25% longer between charges. After the second stock charger failed, I went with this one and am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Failed charger
customer_reviews.text: This product is right at a month old and has already failed, it no longer has power going through to the cart. Any info to as how I can get it returned or replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Courtney E. Boynton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Just got this charger yesterday. Was very surprised how heavy duty the charger is. Easy setup to your kind of batteries. Seems it should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: eddie hammond

customer_reviews.title: Bought open box at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with good charger and battery status indicators. Owners manual is a bit sparse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 48volt 17amp Golf Cart Battery Charger with EZ-Go RXV connector
product_meta.description: Replaces ASIN B00DHRFKX0. Specifications: Large Analog meter with 5-L.E.D Display No Spark Charging, Reverse Battery Protection Accusense-Charge Series High-Reliability Economy Series (Generation IV model) Multi Stage Charging Algorithm Pre-Qualification Test Stage tests the condition of the battery and prepares battery with a specialized Test Charge Algorithm to prepare battery pack for fast charge. Up to 18 A Output Fast charge to quickly replenish 80% capacity Cell-Balancing. The Equalization Stage balances battery cells and increases charged capacity to near 100% DPI’s computational algorithm computes the precise amount of Top-Off Charge which brings the battery to 100% state of charge. Automatic A.C. Disconnection / Reconnection after charger has finished charging conserves energy while continuing to monitor and trickle charge battery pack Periodical Auto-Restart, when batteries are left in storage, assures battery pack is ready to go at the start of the season. Patent Pending Selector allows user to charge most every lead-acid battery type 32 Charge modes available via user accessible switch. Large and Small Capacity Battery Flooded, AGM, Sealed Multi-Chemistry UL/CSA Listed CEC Compliant Designed/Made In USA 31lbs (14kgs), 6.25x6.875x10.25in (159x175x260mm) Please note: If charger does not turn on, please check your batteries. The charger needs at least 18 volts in the pack to begin charging.
feature_bullets: 48Vdc, 17Adc Output, 120 Vac 60 Hz Input Golf Cart Charger
Universal IEC Input Connector with A.C. Line ‘Power-Good’ and Disruption Green/Red L.E.D Indicator
UL/CSA Listed BC Rated Replaces ASIN B00DHRFKX0
Output Connector Type: EzGo RXV Triangle 3 pin Connector
Comes with Relay for Energy Savings

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
